html:
Amazon.com Inc, a US-based online retailer and web service provider, has announced to acquire Prione Business Services Pvt Ltd, a India-based company that offer services that enable SMBs to develop their business profitably using the power of the internet to reach their customers from Catamaran Ventures, an India-based investment firm.

Deal StatusAnnounced: 2021-12-22

Acquirer (Company)Amazon.com, Inc.

Deal Rationale
